text: Gold and Silver (Spanish:Oro y plata) is a 1934 Mexican drama film directed by Ramón Peón and starring Carmen Guerrero, Adolfo Girón and Alfredo del Diestro.Riera p.124 The film's art direction was by Fernando A. Rivero. ==Cast== * Carmen Guerrero as Maruca * Adolfo Girón as Rubén del Castillo * Alfredo del Diestro as Don Ridrigo * Domingo Soler as Juan Antonio * Julio Villarreal as Don Ricardo del Castillo * Beatriz Ramos as Violeta * Antonio R. Frausto as Lencho * Dolores Camarillo as Pareja de Lencho * Paco Martinez as Pedro, criado * Pepe Martínez as Juan * Manuel Tamés as Basilio * Pedro Nava F. as Cura * Felipe de Flores as José * Fabio Acevedo as Simón * A.L. Rocha as Colás * Alfonso Sánchez Tello * Ricardo Marrero * El Trío Maya * Chel López * Carmen Torreblanca == References == == Bibliography == * Emilio García Riera.
